attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world is a dangerous place, we all agree, but enough is enough,there are already more deaths at this early stage in Afghanistan then were in Iraq, We say no to more casualties from the UK,and other countries should follow suit,WE WANT OUR TROOPS BACK HOME NOW!.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
